channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China makes history with $1 trillion trade surplus for first time ever
item.description: China’s exports rebounded in November after an unexpected contraction the previous month, according to data released Monday.

item.title: Mike Bloomberg’s new $50 million mayor bootcamp trains local leaders not to ‘play it safe’
item.description: The initiative brings together 30 mayors and 60 senior officials from 17 countries.

item.title: Next shoe in Netflix-WBD saga drops as Paramount launches hostile bid that includes Trump son-in-law Jared Kushner
item.description: Over the weekend, President Trump voiced concern over the combined market share of Netflix and Warner Bros.

item.title: This Company Says It Can Fix The Food System’s Energy Problem
item.description: The food system is one of the world’s biggest energy users, and one firm says sustainable microgrids can ease rising costs and strengthen reliability.

item.title: Peak XV Taps India’s IPO Boom With Meesho, Wakefit Trading Debuts In December
item.description: Amid India’s IPO boom, more than 10 of Peak XV’s portfolio companies have listed in the past two years, the latest of which are fintech company Pine L...

item.title: Stocks: Everything is on hold until the Fed delivers that rate cut on Wednesday
item.description: The market will get moving again once it digests Chair Powell’s statement and his remarks to the press.

item.title: Anthropic Runs Extensive Survey Based On New AI Tool
item.description: Anthropic’s Clio and Interviewer reveal optimistic Claude work use, but stigma persists, especially for creatives.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Tuesday, December 9
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: ‘It absolutely matters politically’: Swing-district Republicans alarmed at spiking health insurance premiums tipping midterms
item.description: Thirteen Republicans signed an October letter to the House speaker, saying that letting the tax credits lapse "would risk real harm to those we repres...

item.title: Samsung One UI 8.5 Release—Do Not Use This New Galaxy Update
item.description: This Galaxy update is more dangerous than it seems — what to know.

item.title: Fed expected to deliver third straight rate cut this week amid labor concerns
item.description: Fed policymakers face a tough decision on rates with inflation remaining above target as weak job market data and rising layoffs complicate the outloo...

item.title: Leadership changes at Berkshire Hathaway ahead of Warren Buffett’s retirement
Nasdaq climbs but S&P 500 and Dow struggle as Fed decision looms — live updates
Tesla just got a rare downgrade, from a new Morgan Stanley analyst
Paramount reignites Warner Bros. bidding war with bigger offer than Netflix’s
Veteran strategist Ed Yardeni drops preference for tech stocks after 15 years
Fed's favored inflation gauge shows consumer prices remained elevated in September
item.description: The Commerce Department's delayed September PCE inflation report showed that inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2% target ahead of a ...

item.title: US layoffs soar past 1.1M in 2025, highest level since the pandemic
item.description: November layoffs dropped 53% from last month but rose 24% yearly, pushing 2025 job cuts to levels not seen since COVID-19 pandemic struck the American...

item.title: Ford CEO hails Trump fuel standards reset as a 'victory' for affordability and common sense
item.description: New fuel economy standards under Trump will help automakers build what Americans want: affordable vehicles instead of expensive electric cars for cons...

item.title: Grand Canyon South Rim hotels forced to close due to water pipe breaks
item.description: Grand Canyon South Rim faces water emergency as broken pipeline forces hotel closures. Park remains open for day visits while water repairs continue.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
